name: MedicalReasonAndrogenDeprivationTherapyNotAdministeredOrPrescribed
title: Medical Reason Androgen Deprivation Therapy Not Administered or Prescribed
description: Value set to support MIPS Q104 Prostate Cancer: Combination Androgen Deprivation Therapy.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Exceptions / documented reasons for not performing the quality action.),(Data Element Scope: Exceptions for medication therapy),(Inclusion Criteria: Exceptions specific to adjuvant therapy in combination with radiotherapy for prostate cancer.),(Exclusion Criteria: n/a)

concept.display: Documentation of medical reason(s) for not prescribing/administering androgen deprivation therapy in combination with external beam radiotherapy to the prostate (e.g., salvage therapy)

contains.display: Documentation of medical reason(s) for not prescribing/administering androgen deprivation therapy in combination with external beam radiotherapy to the prostate (e.g., salvage therapy)
